data.author: Mario Andretti
data.quote: If everything seems under control, you're not going fast enough.

data.author: Ayrton Senna
data.quote: I am not designed to come second or third. I am designed to win.

data.author: Ayrton Senna
data.quote: Being second is to be the first of the ones who lose.

data.author: Marv Levy
data.quote: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.

data.author: Tom Landry
data.quote: I’ve learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.

data.author: Laird Hamilton
data.quote: Make sure your worst enemy doesn’t live between your own two ears.

data.author: Bo Jackson
data.quote: Set your goals high, and don’t stop till you get there.

data.author: Bo Hogan
data.quote: If you can’t outplay them, outwork them.

data.author: Mike Singletary
data.quote: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.

data.author: Vin Scully
data.quote: Good is not good when better is expected.

data.author: Billie Jean King
data.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.

data.author: Herb Brooks
data.quote: You were born to be a player. You were meant to be here. This moment is yours.

data.author: Mark Spitz
data.quote: If you fail to prepare, you’re prepared to fail.

data.author: George Halas
data.quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.

data.author: Paul Brown
data.quote: When you win, say nothing, when you lose, say less.

data.author: Arnold Palmer
data.quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.

data.author: Ronnie Lott
data.quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.

data.author: Lou Holtz
data.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.

data.author: Dean Smith
data.quote: What do do with a mistake: recognize it, admit it, learn from it, forget it.

data.author: Joe Namath
data.quote: If you aren’t going all the way, why go at all?
